properties.leaders_desc: Waeli was on a government list of 25 al-Qaeda suspects wanted in connection with an alleged plot to launch a major attack before Ramadan ended and the Muslim Eid al-Fitr feast began

properties.notes: Security officials told CNN that at least 14 drone strikes were carried out over the previous two days. Reporting on U.S. drone strikes has been difficult with the Yemeni military simultaneously waging an air and ground war on suspected al-Qaeda militants.
Local officials said the suspected drone attack took place near the border of Shabwa and Maarib Provinces.

properties.notes: The Yemeni embassy in Washington stated that Fahd al-Quso was one of the leaders of AQAP and one of Yemen's most wanted terrorists. The other person in the car was identified by residents as Fahed Salem al-Akdam.

properties.notes: This was the first CIA drone strike in Yemen since 2002. All previous strikes were carried out by the military's Joint Special Operations Command or were cruise missiles launched from U.S. Navy vessels off the Yemeni coast.
